item.title: Sort Solr Facets on Per Field Basis
item.description: I recently faced a strange problem. I was faceting off of multiple facet.fields and I found the need to sort them independently of each other. As far as I knew up to this point facet.sort could only be set once. When I read the doc, however, it was claimed that the facet.sort could be set on a per field basis; sadly no examples were provided nor was it explained any further.

item.title: Optimizing Solr to fit your needs Part 1
item.description: Let me start by saying that eZ Find is a fantastic implementation of Solrfunctionality. With eZ Find you get a fantastic search, out of the box. eZ Find gathers all the content in your system and organizes it for you into strings, text, and keywords (there are more but those the types I use most often). It can look at an eZ Publishkeyword and know that it should thereby be a Solr keyword, again, all out of the box.
